attributes.action: change the perscribed 2 perscriptions per year for alopicia sufferers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a member of alopicia uk (auk) it has been brought to light that we are all not benefiting from the allocated 2 perscriptions for wigs a year.therefore i bring this concern to your attention.

we who have alopicia find this condition hard and basicly have to come to terms with, each and everyone of us in different ways.

the allocated 2 perscriptions per year is factually not enough for us to socially and emotionally deal with.we would request that this is looked upon and changed.

please feel free to observe the A.U.K site for yourselves.
